name: trace_targets
description:
Traces A* paths between a list of target coordinates, avoiding obstacles and saving all reachable points to a file and a visualization image.

Output: Saves the improved path points to a text file and renders a visual path overlay image with arena, obstacles, and path segments.

Example Usage: `trace_targets([(50,50), (150,150)], 'Targets/improved.txt', start=(10,10), data_folder='Data', spacing=5, out_path='Data/trace_output.png')`

input_target_list.description: Required. A list of (x,y) target coordinates. Provide as a list of lists or tuples, e.g., [[50, 50], [150, 150]].

output_target_path.description: Path to write the concatenated reachable points to a plain-text CSV file.

start.description: Optional start position (x, y). If not provided, the robot's current position from the data folder will be used.

data_folder.description: Folder containing arena data, obstacle files, and the camera frame image. Defaults to 'Data'.

spacing.description: Optional dilation spacing (in pixels) around obstacles to ensure safe A* navigation.

out_path.description: Path to save the output visualization PNG showing arena, obstacles, and traced paths.

returns.description: Confirmation message indicating path generation success and saved file location.
